body_html:
@caiosuzuki I've followed the nvidia guide. http://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-installation-guide-linux/index.html#introduction
Don't forget to setup the environment variables!! http://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-installation-guide-linux/index.html#post-installation-actions
Check that your nvidia driver is configured and cuda toolkit is installed properly.
After that I've installed tensorflow gpu in a conda environment. I've problems with tensorflow gpu 1.3 but tensorflow gpu 1.4 works fine for me.
